doc.title: Dark Fall
doc.plot: Returning from work you listen to a frightened and cryptic voice message from your brother, a talented architect redeveloping the old Dowerton station in Dorset, England. Boarding a train to meet him, you travel to Dowerton alone, wondering what adventure you may be embarking on. When you arrive, the train is empty and the station is deserted. You begin to explore the train tunnels, the station, the adjoining hotel,the grounds and discover that although no one is there, you are not alone. Finding artifacts, ancient documents and a valuable journal, you realize that the area holds a history of disappearances and hauntings dating back centuries.
